Drax Project

Hip Hop Artist

Mixing pop, R&B and Jazz, the five-time Aotearoa Music Award winners, Drax Project, have supported the likes of Lorde, Ed Sheeran, Camila Cabello, and Christina Aguilera, winning over audiences worldwide with their catchy tunes and laid-back vibes. Their debut self-titled album gained 18 Platinum certifications, with the hit single Woke Up Late with Hailee Steinfeld collecting over 118 million streams on Spotify alone.

Kicking off 2021 by joining SIX60 on tour - the band had audiences singing at the top of their lungs for smash hits Catching Feelings (ft. SIX60) and Firefly (ft. Fetty WAP & AACACIA), establishing them as a must-see live act.
